Robert Ludlum, His Posthumous Work, and The Ludlum Brand

In life, Ludlum wrote over 20 novels and created a collection of series that were incredibly well-received by the public and remain some of the most well-known action sagas in popular culture.

However, his untimely passing in 2001 left many of his works unfinished or in drafts. As such, Ludlum Entertainmentâ€”his stateâ€”soon greenlighted the publication of some of his drafts posthumously and later allowed multiple authors to continue his work.

Since then, eleven authors have been authorized to publish works under the Ludlum brandâ€”with his name cited on the cover of the books. Most of these writers have continued Ludlumâ€™s series far beyond his original writing, adding up to 32 published novels, with many more scheduled to come out.

To simplify things, the following list of Robert Ludlumâ€™s books in order is comprehensive and features both categories. In this manner, readers can understand the continuity of his universes while still being able to separate his lifeâ€™s work from his legacy.

For convenience, the series will be listed first with the appropriate reading order, while the stand-alone books will be left for last.

The Road To Series

The Road To series is a duology written exclusively by Ludlum. However, the first book was published under the pen name Michael Shepherd.

Action-packed yet witty, The Road To series is a comedy that follows General McKenzie Hawkingsâ€™s misadventures and his quest for over-the-top revenge after being kicked out of the Army.

Reading the Robert Ludlum Books In Order Is Easier Than It Seems

As overwhelming as Ludlumâ€™s books can be, their lack of crossovers or prequels means that reading them in order can be an uncomplicated ordeal that does not require jumping back and forth.

However, remember that as self-contained as his adventures are, all his series build up on the content of the previous entry, so reading them in order is the best way to explore the world of action and conspiracy he and his heirs have crafted.
